biotools.summary: Given a matrix of coordinates, this tool constructs the communities to sample the data points. Then, it builds a graph and after weighting the edges by conductance computation, the graph is passed to a classic spectral clustering algorithm to find and combine the spectral clusters. The resulting connected components estimate biological cell populations in the data sample.
